text: The Houx–Hoefer–Rehkop House is a historic home located at Higginsville, Lafayette County, Missouri. It was built about 1882, and is a two-story, "T"-plan, Italianate style brick dwelling with a hipped roof. It features a front porch with four round columns and two pilasters all with Corinthian order capitals. (includes 13 photographs from 1982) It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1983. ==References== Category:Houses on the National Register of Historic Places in Missouri Category:Italianate architecture in Missouri Category:Houses completed in 1882 Category:Houses in Lafayette County, Missouri Category:National Register of Historic Places in Lafayette County, Missouri
title: Houx-Hoefer-Rehkop House
